title: Resident learning competency enhancement program through emergency simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic first-aid knowledge and mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Simulation learning environment that recreates actual emergency situations through mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Analyze the decision-making process in emergency situations through mathematical modeling and develop optimal resource allocation strategies
